timeline.bodyText: What happens when we failed to open the reader and return here empty? No install request is send. Is this an issue?
timeline.author: Zelldon

replies.bodyText: Ya. Then no install request is send. But will be retried in the next heartbeat/appendEntry turn. In worst case, it will be retried for ever if there is something seriously wrong with the snapshot. The other option is to throw an exception, but this will cause the leader to fail and go to INACTIVE phase.

timeline.bodyText: Could be flaky, since ordering is not guaranteed right?

timeline.message:
fix(atomix): donot build snapshot reader for each install request

FileBasedSnapshotChunkReader read all files in constructor to calculate checksum. When we create a new instance of the reader for each install request, it affects the overall snapshot replication duration.
chore(atomix): use request's currentTerm instead of snapshot's term to reset hearbeat
